m_szDocTitle: Daily Commercial News - $10 million in funds for urban transit research
m_szDocSumamry: by DCN News Services May 2, 2016 TORONTO—Premier Kathleen Wynne recently  announced the province’s plans to inject $10 million over the next four years to support the Canadian Urban Transit Research and Innovation Consortium (CUTRIC). Founded in 2014 with support from the Canadian Urban Transit Association, CUTRIC focuses on advanced public transportation systems which include low emissions electric, hydrogen fuel cell and transit planning solutions.
